rows.label: tlk00040105_msg0001
rows.name:
The Fire Dragons are one of the world's
foremost cooking groups, mo! They're in a
different league from your average chef, mo!

rows.label: tlk00040105_msg0002
rows.name:
And yet... you've beaten them
to a pulp... What are you going
to do about the food, Mo-mo?

rows.label: tlk00040105_msg0003
rows.name:
At this rate, we'll have no choice
but to have the Emperor and Queen
eat the food Punin whipped up, mo!

rows.label: tlk00040105_msg0004
rows.name:
No, but, this might be a chance
for Punin to be recognized as
a first-class chef, mo...

rows.label: tlk00040105_msg0005
rows.name:
Leave this to Punin and
hurry to the hangar, mo!!
